    getKineticEnergy() - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Body
    Calculates the kinetic energy of the body using the formula: KE = 0.5 * mass * velocity^2.
    getKineticEnergy() - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Physics

    GravityCalculator - Class in us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics
    The GravityCalculator class calculates gravitational forces between celestial bodies in the simulation using Newton's law of universal gravitation.
    GravityCalculator(List<Body>) - Constructor for class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.GravityCalculator
    Constructs a GravityCalculator for the given set of celestial bodies.
